title: SET_RESOURCE_KVP
content:
0x21C7A35B// SetResourceKvp
void SET_RESOURCE_KVP(char* key, char* value);Parameters:key: The key to setvalue: The value to writeA setter for GET_RESOURCE_KVP_STRING.Examples:LuaSetResourceKvp('mollis', 'vesuvius citrate')
